item.title: Why this CIO is sounding the alarm on two key consumer bellwether stocks
item.description: Zooming out, stocks struggled to fully recover from a sell-off on Friday, with the S&P 500 slightly lower.

item.title: The stocks that are working as the market struggles over the past month
item.description: Current winners are likely to continue leading equities higher, at least in the near term, said a pair of Wall Street investors.

item.title: Nvidia's CEO sought to help the quantum companies and ended up causing another sell-off in the stocks
item.description: Several quantum stocks ended Thursday in the red.

item.title: The Tesla trend is broken so more losses likely lie ahead, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the charts in shares of the EV maker.
